description: Defines the AppTheme class which provides a customized Material 3 theme configuration for a Flutter application, including color schemes, component styles, and a gradient.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class encapsulating theme configurations for a Flutter app using Material 3, including color schemes, component themes, and gradients.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Provides a ThemeData object configured for a light theme with custom colors and component styles.
